TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IAmbientProvider

summary.span: 返回一个服务，该服务可将有关环境属性或环境类型的信息项返回到类型转换器和标记扩展。

span.span: Represents a service that can return information items about ambient properties or ambient types to type converters and markup extensions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此接口表示的服务的类型转换器和标记扩展来获取环境属性标识符的 XAML 类型系统可帮助 (对象)。This interface represents the service that can help type converters and markup extensions to get the ambient property identifiers for the XAML type system ( objects). 服务还可以从类获取环境属性值。The service can also get the ambient property values from classes. 类型也可以是环境;任何使用该类型作为其值的成员应视为环境。Types can also be ambient; any member that uses that type as its value should be considered ambient. 此服务通常通过调用返回，针对特定于上下文的服务提供程序。This service is typically returned through a call to , which is made against a context-specific service provider. 服务提供程序通常也适用于需要它，如值转换器的执行代码的上下文。The service provider is generally available to contexts that need it, such as the execution code of a value converter. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Type Converters and Markup Extensions for XAML](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/type-converters-and-markup-extensions-for-xaml.md)并[Service Contexts Available to 类型转换器和标记扩展](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/service-contexts-available-to-type-converters-and-markup-extensions.md)。For more information, see [Type Converters and Markup Extensions for XAML](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/type-converters-and-markup-extensions-for-xaml.md) and [Service Contexts Available to Type Converters and Markup Extensions](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/service-contexts-available-to-type-converters-and-markup-extensions.md). ## 有关环境属性About Ambient Properties 环境属性是其属性值应为类型转换器和存在的标记扩展用法在 XAML 节点结构和从它创建的对象图中可用的属性。An ambient property is a property whose property value should be available to type converter and markup extension usages that exist in the XAML node structure and in the object graph created from it. 这是适用于 XAML 处理器在加载路径的对象写入阶段或保存的序列化阶段期间路径。This is relevant for a XAML processor during the object-writing phase of the load path or the serialization phase of a save path. 在加载路径的情况下，环境属性值可能会影响其下存在 XAML 节点结构中的其他属性在对象图中的值。In the load path case, the ambient property value might influence the value in the object graph of other properties that exist underneath it in a XAML node structure. 当处理为 XAML 节点流，环境的概念意味着环境属性值必须是可用于类型转换器和标记扩展`StartObject`到`EndObject`。When processed as a XAML node stream, the ambient concept means the ambient property value must be available to type converters and markup extensions from `StartObject` to `EndObject`. 同样，类型转换器，用于保存路径可以使用环境属性和其值的知识。Similarly, a type converter that is used for the save path can use knowledge of the ambient property and its value. 因此，XAML 生成的是更好的往返过程表示形式。Therefore, the XAML that is produced is a better round-trip representation. 一般情况下，成员的 XAML 不会指定必须处理对象的成员的顺序。For members in general, XAML does not specify the order in which members of an object must be processed. 但是，任何环境属性值都必须首先由 XAML 读取器处理，以便其他属性中包含的类型转换器和标记扩展用法可以访问通过服务。However, any ambient property value must be processed first by the XAML reader so that the type converter and markup extension usages that are contained in other properties can access it through the service. 是一个类似的概念，还会影响 XAML 节点处理顺序。 is a similar concept that also influences XAML node-processing order. 但是，仅用于对等成员和节点关系; 因此不可能影响所有后代。However, can only be used for peer member and node relationships; it cannot influence all descendants. 此外，直接影响对象关系图属性设置; 而环境技术依赖于类型转换器或标记扩展。Also, directly influences object graph property setting; whereas the ambient technique relies on type converters or markup extensions. 在环境的技术中，必须也有特定的类型转换器或标记扩展定义，用于指定应如何解释和应用于对象的环境属性值。In the ambient technique, there must also be a specific type converter or markup extension definition that specifies how the ambient property value should be interpreted and applied to the object. ## WPF 用法说明WPF Usage Notes 中所示的环境属性方案[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]功能集是，可以限定必要的属性名称查找有关其他值。An ambient property scenario that is illustrated in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] feature set is , which can qualify the necessary property name lookups for other values. 在这种情况下，值限定都位于其下的 XAML 节点的值。In this case, the value qualifies the values that are located in the XAML nodes underneath it. 使用的类型转换器行为。 uses the type converter behavior for a . 此行为访问环境通过查询值从可用于类型转换器和标记扩展的服务上下文。This behavior accesses the ambient value by querying from a service context that is available to type converters and markup extensions. 所示的 WPF 功能集的环境类型方案是。An ambient type scenario that is illustrated in the WPF feature set is . 具有属性可以包含其他对象合并，以及这些资源解析的合并的方案冲突预期的顺序与类型的加载顺序。 has a property that can contain other objects to merge, and the intended order of resource resolution for the merged scenario clashes with the order that types are loaded. 适用，以便 XAML 处理器可以正确处理与合并字典中的引用`StaticResource`用法。 applies so that a XAML processor can correctly process the references in a merged dictionary with `StaticResource` usages. 具体而言，`StaticResource`是标记扩展，调用。Specifically, `StaticResource` is a markup extension, which calls .

summary.span: 针对所请求的范围，返回环境类型或属性信息项的可枚举集合。

span.span: Returns an enumerable set of ambient type or property information items for the requested scope.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<object> GetAllAmbientValues (params System.Xaml.XamlType[] types);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<object> GetAllAmbientValues(class System.Xaml.XamlType[] types) cil managed
Public Function GetAllAmbientValues (ParamArray types As XamlType()) As IEnumerable(Of Object)
public: System::Collections::Generic::IEnumerable<System::Object ^> ^ GetAllAmbientValues(... cli::array <System::Xaml::XamlType ^> ^ types);
abstract member GetAllAmbientValues : System.Xaml.XamlType[] -> seq<obj>

param.name: types
param.span: 要从中检索环境类型信息的类型集。

span.span: The set of types from which to retrieve ambient type information.

summary.span: 针对请求的类型，返回可能的环境类型的对象实例的可枚举集合。

span.span: Returns an enumerable set of object instances of possible ambient types for the requested types.

returns.span: 对象的可枚举集合，这些对象表示所请求的 标识符集合的值。

span.span: An enumerable set of objects that represent the values for the requested set of identifiers.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<System.Xaml.AmbientPropertyValue> GetAllAmbientValues (System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<System.Xaml.XamlType> ceilingTypes, params System.Xaml.XamlMember[] properties);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.Xaml.AmbientPropertyValue> GetAllAmbientValues(class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.Xaml.XamlType> ceilingTypes, class System.Xaml.XamlMember[] properties) cil managed

abstract member GetAllAmbientValues : seq<System.Xaml.XamlType> * System.Xaml.XamlMember[] -> seq<System.Xaml.AmbientPropertyValue>

param.name: ceilingTypes
param.span: 指定一个或多个类型，如果在对象图中向上遍历的过程中遇到这些类型，则这些类型应停止计算。

span.span: Specifies one or more types that should stop the evaluation when they are encountered traversing upward in the object graph.

param.span: 此类型包含所需的环境属性。

span.span: This type holds the desired ambient property.
May be .

param.name: properties
param.span: 指定一个或多个属性标识符对象，这些对象标识要视为环境属性的属性。

span.span: Specifies one or more property identifier objects that identify the properties to be considered ambient.

summary.span: 针对所请求的属性集，返回环境属性信息项的可枚举集合。

span.span: Returns an enumerable set of ambient property information items for the requested set of properties.

returns.span: 所请求属性集的环境属性信息的可枚举集合。

span.span: An enumerable set of ambient property information items for the requested set of properties.

returns.span: 返回的每个 的属性信息将与其中一个输入 相匹配。

span.span: The property information for each that is returned will match one of the input .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个返回包含标识符和属性值。Each that is returned contains the identifier and a property value.

span.span: Specifies one or more types that should stop the evaluation when they are encountered traversing upward in the object graph.

span.span: This type holds the desired ambient property.
May be .

param.name: searchLiveStackOnly
param.span: 则不使用已保存的上下文 ； 则使用已保存的上下文。

span.span: to not use a saved context; to use a saved context.
The default is .

param.name: properties
param.span: 指定一个或多个属性标识符对象，这些对象标识要视为环境属性的属性。

span.span: Specifies one or more property identifier objects that identify the properties to be considered ambient.

summary.span: 针对所请求的种类和属性集，返回环境属性信息项的可枚举集合。

span.span: Returns an enumerable set of ambient property information items for the requested set of types and properties.

returns.span: 针对所请求的类型和属性集的环境属性信息项的可枚举集合。

span.span: An enumerable set of ambient property information items for the requested set of types and properties.

returns.span: 返回的每个 的属性信息将与其中一个输入 或 相匹配。

span.span: The property information for each that is returned will match one of the input or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个返回包含标识符和属性值。Each that is returned contains the identifier and a property value. 此特定重载可以搜索的环境类型，并且在同一个环境属性通过一个树。This particular overload can search for ambient types and ambient properties in the same pass through a tree. 使用此重载导致在不同于返回值中的项进行排序或。Using this overload results in an ordering of items in the return value that is different from or . 此重载还允许搜索，则不使用任何已保存的上下文。This overload also permits the search to not use any saved context. 或如果可用重载都隐式使用已保存的上下文 (它们始终作用于一种隐式`searchLiveStackOnly`参数是`false`)。The or overloads implicitly use a saved context if it is available (they always act as if an implicit `searchLiveStackOnly` parameter is `false`). 通过在特定的 XAML 架构上下文，或包含 XAML 的框架已保存的上下文的概念可能以不同的方式处理。The concept of a saved context is potentially handled differently by particular XAML schema contexts, or by frameworks that incorporate XAML. 在 WPF XAML 实现中，保存的上下文用于模板扩展，以及其他功能区域。In the WPF XAML implementation, saved contexts are used for template expansion, as well as other feature areas.

summary.span: 从请求的集合中返回单个环境类型或属性信息项，具体情况视哪个属性是遇到的第一个属性而定。

span.span: Returns a single ambient type or property information item from the requested set, based on which property is first encountered.

span.span: The set of types from which to retrieve ambient type information.

summary.span: 返回第一个匹配对象，该对象是所请求类型可能的环境类型。

span.span: Returns the first matching object that is a possible ambient type for the requested types.

returns.span: 所请求集合的第一个结果对象。

span.span: The first result object for the requested set.

abstract member GetFirstAmbientValue : seq<System.Xaml.XamlType> * System.Xaml.XamlMember[] -> System.Xaml.AmbientPropertyValue

param.name: ceilingTypes
param.span: 指定一个或多个类型，如果在对象图中向上遍历的过程中遇到这些类型，则这些类型应停止计算。

span.span: Specifies one or more types that should stop the evaluation when they are encountered traversing upward in the object graph.

param.span: 此类型包含所需的环境属性。

span.span: This type holds the desired ambient property.

param.name: properties
param.span: 指定一个或多个对象，这些对象标识要视为环境属性的属性。

span.span: Specifies one or more objects that identify the properties to be considered ambient.

summary.span: 从请求的属性集中返回单个环境属性信息项，具体情况视哪个属性是遇到的第一个属性而定。

span.span: Returns a single ambient property information item from the requested set of properties, based on which property is first encountered.

returns.span: 所找到的 列表中第一个环境属性值的单个环境属性信息项。

span.span: A single ambient property information item for the first ambient property value from the list that is found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个返回包含标识符和属性值。Each that is returned contains the identifier and a property value.
